item.description:
Hope everyone had a great weekend..

Dj Laloo is back after a 3 months to Dj in Boston at Caprice.

Back by Popular DEMAND !! The Top Demanded DJ is back !!!

It has been a while since he was back and we sure did miss him.

Last time he played for us we had over 300 + party goers and the place was bumping.

All the way from Bombay to Dubai and now to Boston.

He will make sure we are on our Toes while spinning the best in Bombay Remixes/ Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Desi Mashups

Where: Caprice Boston (2nd Floor)

275 Tremont Street Boston MA

Plenty of parking in the area.

Cover: Ladies Free b4 11PM with RSVP. $10 after until Midnight & Gentlemen $10 on the GL until Midnight. $15 Otherwise.

For Guestlist email: Generationdesi@gmail.com
item.name: Dj Laloo is back this Friday for your Bollywood/Bhangra Fix
